briefdescription.para: Controls display of the background shape in print layout view.
Turns off display of the space between the top of the text and the top edge of the page.
Specifies whether the document is in forms design mode.

detaileddescription.para: Currently works only for documents in WordML format.

briefdescription.para: Controls the view mode in Microsoft Word.

detaileddescription.para: Although Aspose.Words is able to read and write this option, its usage is application-specific. For example MS Word 2013 does not respect the value of this option.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the percentage (between 10 and 500) at which you want to view your document.

detaileddescription.para: If value is 0 then this property uses 100 instead, else if value is less than 10 or greater than 500 this property throws.
Although Aspose.Words is able to read and write this option, its usage is application-specific. For example MS Word 2013 does not respect the value of this option.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets a zoom value based on the size of the window.
Provides various options that control how a document is shown in Microsoft Word.
